document_data.mainbody: '''Joy domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with joyous-themed [[spell]]s and powers.{{cite book/Book of Exalted Deeds|87}}
document_data.Powers: Priests with this domain had a blessed skill at diplomacy.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[vision of heaven]]'', ''[[elation]]'', and ''[[distilled joy]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[good hope]]'', ''[[Lliira's laugh]]'', and ''[[greater heroism]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[starmantle (spell)|starmantle]]'', ''[[sympathy]]'', and ''[[Otto's irresistible dance]]''.
